name: Best Free Game Ever
description:
This game is so free it needs other revenue sources!

Play the game with the arrow key or zqsd and shoot with space!

And don't hesitate to click on all our wonderfull adds!

Made for the Trijam 202: Free for all in 2h58!

Known issues: 
* The reloading of the scene make the browser crash. Don't know why.

Music:

 Run Amok by Kevin MacLeod | https://incompetech.com/
